text:
Maybe you're trying to figure out how to get 
started and move fast on a specific business

or technology problem, or maybe you have 
a long list of projects already in mind,

but you need help prioritizing 
and accelerating. Fortunately,

IBM Garage is here to help, and our no-charge 
Framing Session is a perfect first step!

In just a few short hours, teams are 
able to rapidly brainstorm and identify

their highest-impact, business 
opportunities and define

plus align around which are the 
highest-value one to immediately pursue.
This all happens in a highly-collaborative,

facilitated virtual session that uses 
Enterprise Design Thinking Principles

along with IBM Garage Methodology to ensure 
incredibly successful outcomes, fast.

Let's explore just how we are able to do all of 
that through our IBM Garage Framing Sessions:

Each Framing Session consists of roughly 
5-7 participants from your organization;

including key stakeholders from Business, IT, 
and the like. Having a diverse range of opinions

and perspectives from key decision 
makers is really essential at this stage.
From our side, we bring in an Enterprise Design

Thinking Facilitator - like myself 
- and a Garage Solution Architect,

along with the right team of subject matter 
experts, picked specifically for your session,

to ensure we can help identify meaningful Business 
Opportunities no matter your domain or industry.

Throughout this very engaging, interactive 
session, we perform a number of tailored

activities which act as a funnel, 
allowing us to go from brainstorming

all the possible opportunities we could 
explore to prioritization of the ones

with the most potential business value and 
finally aligning around and framing the right,

highest impact Business 
Opportunity to rapidly pursue.

To make virtual collaboration truly a breeze, we 
like to use an amazing online whiteboarding tool

that allows everyone to generate 
and modify content in real time!

From creating sticky notes, 
adding images, voting and so

much more - there's something truly magical and 
energizing about seeing the flurry of cursors

at work as we swiftly populate activities and 
drive towards incredible outcomes together!

In nearly no time at all, we 
have rapid alignment of top

stakeholders around exactly what we should pursue 
and the actionable next steps to drive towards it;

kicking off your journey and giving you 
an incredible headstart - all at no cost.

Best of all, continuing the journey with 
IBM Garage is just as easy: With Garage,

you have options like focused Garage 
education to jumpstart your teams,

or you can dive right in with an 
IBM Garage Design Thinking Workshop

and Minimum Viable Product Build - enabling you 
to achieve your framed, priority project, fast.

IBM Garage is able to bring an 
incredible unparalleled experience,

a real end-to-end partnership and true, 
speed-to-value success for every project

all while partnering with you each step of the way 
and enabling you on our best-in-class methodology.
Visit ibm.com/garage today to learn more about

IBM Garage and schedule your 
no-charge, Framing Session!
